testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth Step..........................................passed And user enter email "a.aboelfadel1@gmail.com" field........................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And clicks on register button...............................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | Users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid data "a.aboelfadel1@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd"....passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | Users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid data "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
